reviewText: After their Our Journey Home book and "their MP3 book reading", this movie was not quite as inspiring.  My absolute source of George Kavassilas' beliefs and very informative warm presentation style can be found in the 4 DVD in-depth ECETI presentation.  See [...] and/or [...].  That is Five star!
George has to know what he is writing, How could anyone ever think of what he has shared unless they have experienced it !

Our Journey Home the Movie is ideal for those newly awakening. It's well done, easy to understand, and something you can feel comfortable sharing with friends and family. The overall message conveyed throughout the film is a good introduction to george's work, however I recommend reading his book, Our Universal Journey to get a complete understanding of his core message of returning to one's heart and authentic and sovereign beingness. I loved seeing george in natural settings at home, and in his travels around the world, and especially enjoyed seeing Cynthia alongside him throughout the film. <3 Much love for these incredible Beings! They have reminded me of who I AM and for that I am eternally grateful.
Book has mush more information! If you looking for answers, so take a book. George thank you very much!
George is the best! This is mindblowing stuff. Not for the faint of heart. You must be open-minded to take it all in. Transforming...
Excellent video! You wanna be free? Watch this and don't be afraid of yourself! Great video for those beginning to incline sacred knowledge!:)
What is going on?  Buy this DVD for some answers to some VERY BIG questions.  I am very pleased that I bought it.

This is the most amazing doco about revealing the truth and about self empowerment.
I love it because of its message. Be free.

The information in the book is so much more intriguing and informative. It is a real must do Our Journey Home Book. The DVD to me is supposed to be a continuing of the book showing us the mind trips of the author. Maybe a thought for a real movie.

This book is written with so much Love and wisdom. It really helped me through some difficult times. Some people may think that you have to learn or read this 10 times before you understand it. But when you read this and you resonate with it, you simply KNOW everything is written down. It's like 'learnng' for an exam but in this case 'learning' is just remembering. Thank you George and Cynthia for making this book possible.

Yuri

If you have read George's book, this is a great follow up to tie it all together.
I got to met both George and Cynthia a couple of years ago while they toured the US.
They are wonderful, genuine, down to Earth people. I think everyone needs to read this book. It will
change your life and the way you view the world and beyond.
George is a couragous Being and I am thrilled to have found his work. I am right behind ya George. Thank you for making Super Woo trendy.... Love!

This is a lovely dvd and I found it to be a gentler version of George's wonderful book "Our Journey Home"!  When I purchased the book and dvd I was ready to have my mind blown and my beliefs systems challenged.  They delivered!  It was also nice to have some things confirmed: that I'm not the only one having these thoughts, ideas and feelings.  This dvd and book is for anyone willing to look beyond what is right in front of you!  Be brave, be bold and do not fear!  All will be well!
